channel.title: Javascript hacks!
channel.description:
We all know what they are--you put the hacks into your browser's url bar, and BOOM, things happen! I am trying to compile a list of useful(and fun!) javascript hacks, so, if you know any, post away!!
Here is one:
Make images SPIN!
Go to a website, say, www.amazon.com then, type this into the browser url bar:[code]javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math.sin(R*x1+i*x2+x3)*x4+x5; DIS.top=Math.cos(R*y1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval('A()',5); void(0)[/code]
GET IT ALL IN!
It will spin lots of images!
Ignore filesend download wait: Go to a filesend link. see that you need to wait 25 seconds for the download link to appear? Well, that's WAY too long! How about only FIVE seconds? Go to the link, and put the following into th address bar: [code] javascript:alert(time=0); [/code]
Post some javascript hacks if you like, or comment on the one above!

item.title: Javascript hacks!
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

It’s called a JavaScript Injection, not hack

Read full topic

item.title: Javascript hacks!
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

lol add more
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 11:02:34 AM[/size][hr]javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300;y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style;DIS.position=‘absolute’; DIS.left=Math.sin(Rx1+ix2+x3)x4+x5; DIS.top=Math.cos(Ry1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval(‘A()’,5); void(0)

Try on www.hotfreelayouts.com
lol

item.description:
@mc-Jacob wrote:

Omg thanks that has been soo useful to me what would I of done without this thanks soo much!! You saved my life. Did you know holding down Alt+F4 is a magical portal opener so is CTRL+W :o.

item.title: Javascript hacks!
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

We all know what they are–you put the hacks into your browser’s url bar, and BOOM, things happen! I am trying to compile a list of useful(and fun!) javascript hacks, so, if you know any, post away!!

Here is one:

Make images SPIN!

Go to a website, say, www.amazon.com
then, type this into the browser url bar:javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math.sin(R*x1+i*x2+x3)*x4+x5; DIS.top=Math.cos(R*y1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval('A()',5); void(0)

GET IT ALL IN!

It will spin lots of images!

Ignore filesend download wait:
Go to a filesend link. see that you need to wait 25 seconds for the download link to appear? Well, that’s WAY too long! How about only FIVE seconds? Go to the link, and put the following into th address bar:

javascript:alert(time=0);

Post some javascript hacks if you like, or comment on the one above!
